explains: v. 经历，遭遇；体会到，感受到（experience 的过去式和过去分词形式）
wordGroup: experienced in 有经验；在…方面有经验
experienced person 具备经验的人

sentences.en: She's very young and not very experienced.
He's very experienced in looking after animals.
Although he was experienced, he was not infallible.
sentences.cn: 尽管他经验丰富，却并非不会出错。
